entries.title: House Progressives Float Diplomatic Path Toward Ending War in Ukraine, Get Annihilated, Quickly “Clarify"
entries.description:
“Let me be clear: We are united as Democrats in our unequivocal commitment to supporting Ukraine in their fight for their democracy,” Rep. Pramila Jayapal clarified.

The post House Progressives Float Diplomatic Path Toward Ending War in Ukraine, Get Annihilated, Quickly “Clarify” appeared first on The Intercept.

entries.title: Larry Krasner Impeachment Committee Relies on Widely Panned Journal Study
entries.description:
Critics said the study cited by the Pennsylvania lawmakers used flawed methods to blame prosecutorial policies for increased murders.

The post Larry Krasner Impeachment Committee Relies on Widely Panned Journal Study appeared first on The Intercept.
